main event: A witness in Havarre, Ohio observed a bright light in the southeastern sky that changed between red and green for 45 to 55 minutes, before clouds obscured it.
interesting points: The observer reported the sighting to authorities but was in an excited state, which may affect the reliability of the report., The visibility conditions were clear with stars visible at the time of the sighting., The object's flight path was estimated at 153 degrees., The observer claimed this light closely resembled Mars., No physical evidence was recorded to corroborate the sighting after the observer declined to return an additional form.
sighted object: A bright light changing color between red and green
witness description: The observer was in a rather excited state while making the report.
